code: import{seasonalItems}from"./productsAndIngredients";import{seasonalMenu}from"./employee_pages/managerLandingFunctions";export async function getSeasonalData(){const seasonalData=await seasonalMenu();for(const item of seasonalData){const itemInfo={name:item.name,price:item.price,image:'images/transparentBack.png',modifications:[{type:'+',changes:[]},{type:'-',changes:[]}],ingredients:item.inventory_items,custom:item.modify_items};seasonalItems.push(itemInfo);}console.log(seasonalItems);}
